body.p:
dear walter how my heart yearning towards him there without a wife or Mother to care for him do you know I always had a great for him I would like to write to him but dare not if you should do so please send my sympathy and fine regards and John also I don't suppose he would know who I am
as this is sunday and I have no paper in the house you must make all allowance for this
body.note: I received this from Sarah Avery
